alert.note: Alert for Barton; Ellsworth; Saline (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 31 at 10:42AM CST until January 02 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO MIDNIGHT CST SATURDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches. Also, dangerously cold wind chills down to around 15 degrees below zero at times. * WHERE...Barton, Ellsworth and Saline Counties. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to midnight Saturday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow will significantly reduce visibility at times. Dangerously cold wind chills will result in hypothermia if precautions are not taken. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow may mix with sleet at times, especially near the onset of precipitation and into the predawn hours on Saturday.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
